mapper.update: UPDATE KPAY_CRD_TR_MNG SET TLM_IF_FLG = #{tlmIfFlg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TLM_IF_MSG = #{tlmIfMsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INP_USR_ID = 'H', INP_DTHMS = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, MDF_USR_ID = 'H', MDF_DTHMS = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE TLM_CRNO = #{tlmCrno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(sum(CASE WHEN DATA_FLGCD IN ('PAYMENT') THEN TR_AMT ELSE 0 END ) - sum(CASE WHEN DATA_FLGCD IN ('CANCEL') THEN TR_AMT ELSE 0 END ) ) AS atrAmt , TO_CHAR(sum(CASE WHEN DATA_FLGCD IN ('PAYMENT') THEN STE_AMT ELSE 0 END ) - sum(CASE WHEN DATA_FLGCD IN('CANCEL') THEN STE_AMT ELSE 0 END ) ) AS asteAmt FROM KPAY_CRD_BASE_MNG WHERE (TLM_CRNO = #{tlmCrno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR GB_TR_MGTNO = #{tlmCrno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT TLM_CRNO AS tlmCrno ,GB_TR_MGTNO AS gbTrMgtno ,TO_CHAR (WRTDT,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') AS wrtdt ,REC_SEQNO AS recSeqno ,DATA_FLGCD AS dataFlgcd ,CRDNO AS crdno ,AT_MNT AS atMnt ,CRD_LIMT AS crdLimt ,CVC AS cvc ,TR_AMT AS trAmt ,STE_AMT AS steAmt ,TLM_IF_FLG AS tlmIfFlg ,TLM_IF_MSG AS tlmIfMsg ,ENC_CRD_WRT AS encCrdWrt ,ECT_WRT AS ectWrt FROM ( SELECT TLM_CRNO , GB_TR_MGTNO , WRTDT , REC_SEQNO , DATA_FLGCD , CRDNO , AT_MNT , CRD_LIMT , CVC , TR_AMT , STE_AMT , TLM_IF_FLG , TLM_IF_MSG ,'' AS ENC_CRD_WRT ,'' AS ECT_WRT ,'2' AS SORT_IDX FROM PUBLIC.KPAY_CRD_TR_MNG WHERE TLM_CRNO = #{tlmCrno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT TLM_CRNO , GB_TR_MGTNO , WRTDT , REC_SEQNO , DATA_FLGCD , CRDNO , AT_MNT , CRD_LIMT , CVC , TR_AMT , STE_AMT ,'' AS TLM_IF_FLG ,'' AS TLM_IF_MSG , ENC_CRD_WRT , ECT_WRT ,'1' AS SORT_IDX FROM PUBLIC.KPAY_CRD_BASE_MNG WHERE TLM_CRNO = #{tlmCrno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ORDER BY SORT_IDX LIMIT 1
